<jobs>
    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Loss Prevention Officer]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
Immediate Opening for a Full and Part-Time Loss Prevention OfficerLocation: Retail Store Forsyth, IL
  

  
If you have any questions email LPOperations@1stclasssecurity.comJob Description:- Identify shoplifters thru floor patrol and through the use of Closed Circuit TV- Report writing- Interacting with local law enforcement agencies as needed- Provide court room testimony as required
  

  
Ability to read, write and speak English proficiently.
  

  
Full-time/ 40 hours per week
  

  
Part-Time / 20 hours per week 
  

  
$19.00 per hour
  

  
 Job Requirement:- Pre-Employment criminal background and drug screen- Ability to sit, stand, and walk for up to 3-4 hours at a time- Reliable transportation- Ability to communicate clearly and accurately through verbal and written means- Ability to write legible, accurate and easily understood reports- Must be assertive, yet controlled in dealing with confrontation- Must be trustworthy and able to work under little or no direct supervision- Attendance for scheduled shifts. Tardiness and absenteeism is not tolerated- Previous loss prevention experience a plus, but not a requirement- High school diploma or equivalent (minimum)- Criminal Justice or related studies a plus  
  

  
Must be able to obtain state required PERC prior to employmentThis is an immediate opening. Paid training will be provided.
  

  
 
  

  
1st Class Security is an EEO/AA employer
  

  
Powered by JazzHR

        <description><![CDATA[
  
  Immediate Opening for a Full Time and Part  Time Loss Prevention Officer Location: Council Bluffs Area  
  

  
 Job Description:- Identify shoplifters thru floor patrol and through the use of Closed Circuit TV- Report writing- Interacting with local law enforcement agencies as needed- Provide court room testimony as required 
  

  
 Ability to read, write and speak English proficiently. 
  

  
 Full-time/ 30 - 40 hours per week 
  

  
 Part-Time/ 15-29 hours per week  
  

  
 Job Requirement:- Pre-Employment criminal background and drug screen- Ability to sit, stand, and walk for up to 3-4 hours at a time- Reliable transportation- Ability to communicate clearly and accurately through verbal and written means- Ability to write legible, accurate and easily understood reports- Must be assertive, yet controlled in dealing with confrontation- Must be trustworthy and able to work under little or no direct supervision- Attendance for scheduled shifts. Tardiness and absenteeism is not tolerated- Previous loss prevention experience a plus, but not a requirement- High school diploma or equivalent (minimum)- Criminal Justice or related studies a plus  This is an immediate opening. 
  

  
 Paid training provided 
  

  
 Pay:  $19.00 per hour 
  

  
 401K 
  

  
 PTO - Paid Time Off 
  

  
 Health Insurance 
  

  
   
  

  
 If you have any questions, please email lpoperations@1stclasssecurity.com
